items.title: Bowen: Zelensky buoyant, but Europe will struggle to guarantee Ukraine's security
items.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky shares this thoughts on Europe's support and his country's resilience.

items.title: Germany leads defiance to Trump car tariffs, saying it 'will not give in'
items.description: Major economies vow to retaliate, with China accusing Washington of violating international trade rules.

items.title: Ian McKellen and Patrick Stewart join Avengers: Doomsday cast
items.description: The film is set for release in May 2026, with Robert Downey Jr already announced as playing Doctor Doom.

items.title: BBC's Mark Lowen deported from Turkey after covering protests
items.description: Mark Lowen was covering the protests in Istanbul when he was arrested and later deported back to the UK, the BBC has said.

items.title: VP's arrest ends South Sudan peace deal, his party says
items.description: Riek Machar and his wife are detained after a convoy of 20 armed vehicles entered his home, his party says.
